description: Footworship.com is proud to present it’s first scripted feature production, Faster, PUSSYFOOT! Kill! Kill! Maitresse Madeline and her crew of film making foot fanatics bring to you a foot centric feature unlike anything you’ve seen before! Paying homage to one of the most influential cult classics, Russ Meyer’s 1965 hit Faster, Pussycat! Kill! Kill!, Maitresse Madeline and her fantastically radical foot frenzied mind twists the script and story to present a foot fetish film that will tantalize and ultimately satisfy all your foot needs! Foot worshiping, foot licking, foot wrestling, trampling, boots, bare soles, socks, lesbian foot domination, foot sex, foot jobs, cum on scrunched soles and so much more! If you like fast cars, fast women and feet, you don’t want to miss this movie!
title: Faster, PUSSYFOOT! Kill! Kill! A FOOTSPLOITATION film!
